EmailTemplate.description: Sales - REL1 - Email sent to AE 120 & 90 days before Opportunity Effective date if the opportunity is not Complete
EmailTemplate.name: OPP - Reminder Email Oppty not Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTION REQUIRED: RENEWAL TO BE FINALIZED - {!Opportunity.Account}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account Executive - The purpose of this email is to notify you that the following opportunity has not been finalized:
Click here to access your opportunity- {!Opportunity.Name} It is very important that you finalize the renewal opportunity to a final stage: Renewal Finalized or Customer Termed.
In addition, all products within your renewal opportunity must indicate a final product stage (i.e., Renewed, Termed, IGAP Sold, etc.). Please confirm all product line details to ensure existing information is accurate and all applicable fields have been completed.
The renewal must be finalized prior to the CIP submission. We realize that there may be exceptions to products being finalized, such as Stop Loss. Thank you for your prompt attention to this email.
